Table 11.  Number of sentenced prisoners under State
or Federal jurisdiction, by gender and race, 1990, 1995-97
Note: Previous estimates for 1996 by gender and race have been revised.
Sentenced prisoners are those with a sentence of more than 1 year.
a/Includes Asians, Pacific Islanders, American Indians, Alaska Natives, and
b/The numbers for gender and race were estimated and rounded to the nearest 100.
